definitions.title: n. [m.]
definitions.body: ? gain acquisition ?—Only sf. [[לאׁ יִטֶּה לָאָרֶץ מִנְלָם]] Job 15:29 (si vera l.) their acquisition, but very dub.; Di (formerly) [[שִׁבֳּלִים]], Hi [[מְלִלִים]] ears, cf. Bu; other conj. v. in Di; Du thinks hopelessly corrupt.—LXX skia/n [i.e. [[חִלָּם]]], SyrVer their word [[[מִלָּתָם]]].
